trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Rename-Item
trans-unit.target: Rename-Item

trans-unit.source: Rename-Item
trans-unit.target: Rename-Item

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Renames an item in a Windows PowerShell provider namespace.
trans-unit.target: 重命名 Windows PowerShell 提供程序命名空间中的一个项。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: ByPath (Default)
trans-unit.target: ByPath （默认值）

trans-unit.source: ByLiteralPath
trans-unit.target: ByLiteralPath

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Rename-Item cmdlet changes the name of a specified item.
trans-unit.target: Rename-Item cmdlet 更改指定项的名称。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not affect the content of the item being renamed.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 不影响正被重命名的项的内容。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use Rename-Item to move an item, such as by specifying a path along with the new name.
trans-unit.target: 不能使用 Rename-Item 移动项，例如，不能通过指定路径及新名称来移动项。

trans-unit.source: To move and rename an item, use the Move-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要移动并重命名项，请使用 Move-Item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: This command renames the file daily_file.txt to monday_file.txt.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将文件 daily_file.txt 重命名为 monday_file.txt。

trans-unit.source: This example shows that you cannot use the Rename-Item cmdlet to both rename and move an item.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明不能使用 Rename-Item cmdlet 同时重命名和移动项。

trans-unit.source: Specifically, you cannot supply a path for the value of the NewName parameter, unless the path is identical to the path specified in the Path parameter.
trans-unit.target: 具体来说，不能为 NewName 参数的值提供路径，除非该路径与 Path 参数中指定的路径相同。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, only a new name is permitted.
trans-unit.target: 在其他情况下，仅允许输入新名称。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Rename-Item cmdlet to rename the project.txt file in the current directory to old-project.txt in the D:\Archive directory.
trans-unit.target: 第一个命令使用 Rename-Item cmdlet 将当前目录中的 project.txt 文件重命名为 D:\Archive 目录中的 old-project.txt。

trans-unit.source: The result is the error shown in the output.
trans-unit.target: 结果将在输出中显示错误。

trans-unit.source: The second command shows the correct way to move and rename a file by using the Move-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 第二个命令显示使用 Move-Item cmdlet 移动并重命名文件的正确方法。

trans-unit.source: The Move-Item cmdlet lets you specify both a new path and a new name in the value of its Destination parameter.
trans-unit.target: Move-Item cmdlet 允许你在其 Destination 参数值中同时指定新路径和新名称。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the Rename-Item cmdlet to rename a registry key from Advertising to Marketing.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 Rename-Item cmdlet 将注册表项 Advertising 重命名为 Marketing。

trans-unit.source: When the command is complete, the key is renamed, but the registry entries in the key are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 当该命令完成时，将重命名该注册表项，但该注册表项中的注册表条目保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to use the Replace operator to rename multiple files, even though the NewName parameter does not accept wildcard characters.
trans-unit.target: 此示例说明如何使用替换运算符重命名多个文件，即使 NewName 参数不接受通配符也是如此。

trans-unit.source: This command renames all of the .txt files in the current directory to .log.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将当前目录中的所有 .txt 文件重命名为 .log。

trans-unit.source: The command uses a Get-ChildItem cmdlet to get all of the files in the current directory that have a .txt file name extension.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Get-ChildItem cmdlet 获取当前目录中具有 .txt 文件扩展名的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Then, it uses the pipeline operator (|) to send the resulting files to the Rename-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用管道运算符 (|) 将所得到的文件发送给 Rename-Item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: In the Rename-Item command, the value of the NewName parameter is a script block that is executed before the value is submitted to the NewName parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在 Rename-Item 命令中，NewName 参数的值是一个在将该值提交给 NewName 参数之前执行的脚本块。

trans-unit.source: In the script block, the $_ automatic variable represents each file object as it comes to the command through the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 在该脚本块中，$_ automatic 变量表示通过管道传递给该命令的各文件对象。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the dot format (.) to get the Name property of each file object.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用点格式 (.) 获取每个文件对象的 Name 属性。

trans-unit.source: The Replace operator replaces the ".txt" file name extension of each file with ".log".
trans-unit.target: 替换运算符会将各文件的“.txt”文件扩展名替换为“.log”。

trans-unit.source: Because the Replace operator works with regular expressions, the dot preceding "txt" is interpreted to match any character.
trans-unit.target: 因为替换运算符用于正则表达式，所以“txt”之前的点会被解释为匹配任何字符。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that it matches only a dot (.), it is escaped with a backslash character (\\).
trans-unit.target: 若要确保它仅匹配点 （.），用反斜杠字符转义 (\\)。

trans-unit.source: The backslash character is not required in ".log" because it is a string, not a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 因为“.log”是字符串而不是正则表达式，所以它不需要反斜杠字符。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Credential
trans-unit.target: -Credential

trans-unit.source: Specifies a user account that has permission to perform this action.
trans-unit.target: 指定有权执行此操作的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: The default is the current user.
trans-unit.target: 默认为当前用户。

trans-unit.source: Type a user name, such as "User01" or "Domain01\User01", or enter a PSCredential object, such as one generated by the Get-Credential cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 键入用户名，如“User01”或“Domain01\User01”；或输入 PSCredential 对象，如 Get-Credential cmdlet 输入的一个 PSCredential 对象。

trans-unit.source: If you type a user name, you will be prompted for a password.
trans-unit.target: 如果键入用户名，则将提示你输入密码。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not supported by any providers installed with Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 随同 Windows PowerShell 一起安装的任何提供程序都不支持此参数。

trans-unit.source: -Force
trans-unit.target: -Force

trans-unit.source: Allows the cmdlet to rename items that cannot otherwise be changed, such as hidden or read-only files or read-only aliases or variables.
trans-unit.target: 允许该 cmdlet 重命名非此不能更改的项，如隐藏文件或只读文件，或者只读别名或变量。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet cannot change constant aliases or variables.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不能更改常量别名或变量。

trans-unit.source: Implementation varies from provider to provider.
trans-unit.target: 不同提供程序有不同的实现。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.source: Even using the Force parameter, the cmdlet cannot override security restrictions.
trans-unit.target: 即使使用 Force 参数，该 cmdlet 也无法覆盖安全限制。

trans-unit.source: -LiteralPath
trans-unit.target: -LiteralPath

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the item to rename.
trans-unit.target: 指定要重命名的项的路径。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the **Path** parameter, the value of **LiteralPath** is used exactly as it is typed.
trans-unit.target: 与不同 **路径** 参数、 的值 **LiteralPath** 完全按照其键入时，才使用。

trans-unit.source: No characters are interpreted as wildcards.
trans-unit.target: 不会将任何字符解释为通配符。

trans-unit.source: If the path includes escape characters, enclose it in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果路径包括转义符，请将其括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Single quotation marks tell Windows PowerShell not to interpret any characters as escape sequences.
trans-unit.target: 单引号会告知 Windows PowerShell 不要将所有字符都解释为转义序列。

trans-unit.source: -NewName
trans-unit.target: 的新名称

trans-unit.source: Specifies the new name of the item.
trans-unit.target: 指定项的新名称。

trans-unit.source: Enter only a name, not a path and name.
trans-unit.target: 请仅输入名称，而不是路径加名称。

trans-unit.source: If you enter a path that is different from the path that is specified in the Path parameter, Rename-Item generates an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果输入的路径不同于 Path 参数中指定的路径，则 Rename-Item 会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: To rename and move an item, use the Move-Item cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 要重命名并移动项，请使用 Move-Item cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use wildcard characters in the value of NewName.
trans-unit.target: 不能在 NewName 的值中使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: To specify a name for multiple files, use the Replace operator in a regular expression.
trans-unit.target: 要为多个文件指定名称，请使用正则表达式中的替换运算符。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Replace operator, type "get-help about_comparison_operators".
trans-unit.target: 有关替换运算符的详细信息，请键入“get-help about_comparison_operators”。

trans-unit.source: For a demonstration, see the examples.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示，请参阅示例。

trans-unit.source: -PassThru
trans-unit.target: -PassThru

trans-unit.source: Passes an object representing the item to the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: 将表示项的对象传递到管道。

trans-unit.source: By default, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此 cmdlet 将不产生任何输出。

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Specifies the path to the item to rename.
trans-unit.target: 指定要重命名的项的路径。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: -UseTransaction
trans-unit.target: -UseTransaction

trans-unit.source: Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在活动事务中使用该命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see Includes the command in the active transaction.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅包括在活动事务中的命令。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is valid only when a transaction is in progress.
trans-unit.target: 仅当正在执行事务时，此参数才有效。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅本主题后面的

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe a string that contains a path to Rename-Item.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过管道将包含路径的字符串传递给 Rename-Item。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None or an object representing the renamed item.
trans-unit.target: 无或表示已重命名的项的对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use the Passthru parameter, Rename-Item generates an object representing the renamed item.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 Passthru 参数，则 Rename-Item 生成一个表示已重命名项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The Rename-Item cmdlet is designed to work with the data exposed by any provider.
trans-unit.target: Rename-Item cmdlet 用于处理由任何提供程序公开的数据。

trans-unit.source: To list the providers available in your session, type "Get-PsProvider".
trans-unit.target: 若要列出会话中可用的提供程序，请键入“Get-PsProvider”。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Providers.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_Providers。

trans-unit.target: 相关的链接
